name: 辜率品
objective:
本課程主要以歷史脈絡與觀點，鼓勵學生瞭解時空推移與聚落發展及計畫需求的差異，以加強其專業潛力及強化其能力以服務人群。課程內容主要包括：
一、 都市化的萌芽
二、 古典都市
三、 中世紀城鎮
四、 新古典城市
五、 工業革命
六、 都市對比
七、 生活條件提昇
八、 尋求好的都市
九、 重建都市與現代社會趨勢
schedule:
1.　　The European Cities and the Global Tourism
歐洲城市和全球觀光
2.　　The Prague, Venice and Various Popular Destinations
布拉格威尼斯和其他熱門旅遊景點
3.　　The Transformation of the City and the Representation of Film
城市的演變和電影的涵義
4.　　The Public, Public Art and The Build Environment
公共性公共藝術和建築環境
5. The Creation of Public Places: 1) The Nature and the Distribution of Public Places; 2) Size and Typologies; 3) The Contemporary Public Place
公共空間的創造
6. The Architecture of the City: 1) The Collective Memory; 2) The Typology; 3) The
Urban Artifacts.
城市建築
7. The City and Cultural Geography: 1) The Symbolic Landscape; 2) The Simulation Landscape; 3) Place or Space; 4) City of Consumption
城市和文化地理
8. Hyper City: 1) City in the Electronic Age; 2) Transparency; 3) Projection; 4) Mutation; 5) Virtual.
超限城市
9. The Cities in History-- from Lewis Mumford
10.The Faith and the City: 1) God and the City Center; 2) The Separation of Church and State; 3) The Ideal Center of the City.
11.The City and Its Boundary: 1) The Customs Boundary; 2) The Nature of City Wall; 3) River Towns; 4) Suburbia and Edge Cities.
12. The Street: 1) The Street and Public Space; 2) The Street Types; 3) The Building Line; 4) The Modernist Street and Its Evolution.
13. The Urban Transformation: 1) The Decline and Renaissance of the City; 2) The Destruction and Reconstruction of the City; 3) Urban Renewal and Related Issues.
